oai_dc:dc.dc:descriptions: The Blue Crane, the two Lions, and the Mantis. In this story, the Blue Crane, while searching for the Frog’s husband, is killed and eaten by the Lions, and restored to life by the Mantis. By /han≠kass’o (L VIII.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: How the Blue Crane vainly sought for !kuommain |ka ||kau, was killed and eaten by the Lions, and restored to life by means of one of the bones of the Mantis (Part 2)
